title: Alibaba Aur 40 Chor
cast: Dharmendra, Hema Malini, Zeenat Aman, Rolan Bykov, Prem Chopra, Yakub Akhmedov, Madan Puri, Sofiko Chiaureli
listed_in: Action & Adventure, International Movies, Sci-Fi & Fantasy
description: A simple village man is thrown into a web of political intrigue after he takes on a powerful and ruthless gang of bandits.

title: Friendship
cast: Amitabh Bachchan, Shatrughan Sinha, Zeenat Aman, Prem Chopra, Amrish Puri, Helen, Pran, Gajanan Jagirdar, Sajjan, Iftekhar
description: Best friends since childhood, a righteous cop and a lawyer who represents criminals in court become rivals when they fall for the same woman.

title: Khubsoorat
cast: Ashok Kumar, Rekha, Rakesh Roshan, Shashikala, Aradhana, Dina Pathak, David Abraham, S.N. Banerjee, Keshto Mukherjee
description: A strict matriarch's regimented household is upended by the arrival of a spunky relative who challenges the rules.

title: Playing for Time
cast: Vanessa Redgrave, Jane Alexander, Maud Adams, Donna Haley, Robin Bartlett, Marisa Berenson, Will Lee, Verna Bloom, Christine Baranski, Lenore Harris
description: Captured by Nazis and sent to Auschwitz, a Jewish musician is assigned to soothe other prisoners marching to their deaths in the gas chambers.

title: Popeye
cast: Robin Williams, Shelley Duvall, Ray Walston, Paul Dooley, Paul L. Smith, Richard Libertini, Donald Moffat, Macintyre Dixon, Roberta Maxwell, Donovan Scott
listed_in: Action & Adventure, Children & Family Movies, Comedies
description: During a storm that wrecks his ship, super-strong sailor Popeye washes ashore and winds up rooming at the Oyl household, where he meets Olive.

title: Raging Bull
cast: Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci, Frank Vincent, Nicholas Colasanto, Theresa Saldana, Mario Gallo, Frank Adonis, Joseph Bono
description: This gritty biopic of brutal boxer Jake LaMotta portrays a tormented soul rising to the top of his sport, only to be undone by his demons.

title: Return To The 36th Chamber
cast: Gordon Liu, Lung Wei Wang, Hou Hsiao, Lun Hua, Yeong-mun Kwon, Kara Hui, Szu-Chia Chen, Tsui Ling Yu, Wei Hao Teng, Gong Shih
description: When thugs prey upon innocent factory workers, a small-time scammer trains for revenge by studying the moves of Shaolin temple monks.

title: Sword Masters: Two Champions of Shaolin
cast: Meng Lo, Sheng Chiang, Li Wang, Siu-Ho Chin, Feng Lu, Chien Sun, Hsueh-erh Wen, Tai-Ping Yu
description: Shaolin warrior Tung Chien-chen is injured in battle against the hated Wu Tang clan, and nursed back to health by a knife-throwing master. As he recovers, Tung learns this deadly art, and also falls in love with his teacher's daughter.

title: Whispers
description: With her home devastated by war, a Lebanese poet takes a cross-country road trip, looking for glimmers of hope through nostalgic memories and verse.
